Article.ArticleTitle: Comment on Hsieh et al. COVID-19 Vaccination Prior to SARS-CoV-2 Infection Reduced Risk of Subsequent Diabetes Mellitus: A Real-World Investigation Using U.S. Electronic Health Records. Diabetes Care 2023;46:2193-2200.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Duality of Interest. W.R. reports the receipt of consulting fees for attending educational sessions by Novo Nordisk outside the topic of the current work. No other potential conflicts of interest relevant to this article were reported.
